text: ──I do think I'm being arrogant, you know?

If it's something that would bother me if it were done
to me, then I went and did it to others in a big way.

...I stepped over the line, trampled around,
and forcefully dragged out their true feelings.

No, don't say it's different.
Because it's not.

As Yuika, I think it's a big deal,
...knowing full well what it entails...
......Still, I couldn't help but do it!

This time with Sakuya, if I made one wrong move,
it could've been with Yuika.

Surely, even when it's Yuika, everyone would still
be willing to face her head-on together, right?

──Which means...
I realized I need to be prepared.

Yeah.
──Yuika Mitsumine, prepared to tackle her weak points.
Aww, you already know even without me saying it.
Don't make me say it, you meanie♡
